V03vinv06_u:489: atha bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ dhautahastam apanītapātraṃ niṣaṇṇaṃ viditvā sauvarṇaṃ bhṛṅgāraṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purataḥ sthitvā yācamāna evaṃ cāha /
V03vinv06_u:490: bhagavatā te te duṣṭanāgā duṣṭayakṣā vinītāḥ /
V03vinv06_u:491: iyaṃ bhadanta kuntī yakṣiṇī asmākaṃ dīrgharātram asapatnānāṃ sapatnī adrugdhānāṃ drogdhrī jātāni jātāny apatyāni harati /
V03vinv06_u:492: aho vata bhagavān kuntīṃ yakṣiṇīṃ vinayed anukampām upādāyeti /
V03vinv06_u:493: tena khalu samayena kuntī yakṣiṇī tasyām eva parṣadi sanniṣaṇṇābhūt* sannipatitā /
V03vinv06_u:501: viraṃsyāmi yady ete mamārthāya vihāraṃ kārayanti /
V03vinv06_u:507: atha bhagavān kuntīṃ yakṣīṇīṃ saparivārāṃ vinīya prakrāntaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:511: bhagavān bāladārakān pāṃsustūpakaiḥ krīḍato dṛṣṭvā ca (MSV I 2)
V03vinv06_u:513: paśyasi tvaṃ vajrapāṇe bāladārakān pāṃsustūpakaiḥ krīḍataḥ /
V03vinv06_u:515: eṣa caturvarṣaśataparinirvṛtasya mama vajrapāṇe kuśanavaṃśyaḥ kaniṣko nāma rājā bhaviṣyati /
V03vinv06_u:519: tato bhagavān yāvac cāpalālasya bhavanaṃ yāvac ca rohitakam atrāntare saptasaptatiprāṇiśatasahasrāṇi vinīya rohitakam āgatya vihāraṃ praviśya pratisaṃlīnaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:520: bhagavān sāyāhne pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāyāyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate /
V03vinv06_u:533: gato 'ham ānanda yāvac ca rohitakaṃ yāvac cāpalālasya nāgarājasya bhuvanam* /
V03vinv06_u:535: pañcādīnavā uttarāpathe sthāṇukaṇṭakadrumapāṣāṇaśarkaraś caṇḍakukkuro duṣṭhulasamudācāro mātṛgrāmaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:538: ādirājyaṃ ca bhadrāśvo mathurā otalā ca /
V03vinv06_u:539: ārāmavairaṃbhya ayodhyā ca nadī gaṅgā pretā velāmo bhavati paścimaḥ //
V03vinv06_u:540: atha bhagavāñ chūraseneṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ carann ādirājyam anuprāptaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:542: asminn ānanda pradeśe mahāsammato rājā prathamato rājyābhiṣekenābhiṣiktaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:543: abhiṣikto 'yaṃ ca rājñām ādirato 'syādirājyaḥ ādirājya iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā /
V03vinv06_u:546: asminn ānanda pradeśe rājño mahāsammatasya bhadram aśvaratnaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ yato 'sya bhadrāśvo bhadrāśva iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā /
V03vinv06_u:549: evaṃ bhadanta ity āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt* /
V03vinv06_u:551: dūrād eva nīlanīlāṃ bhagavān vanarājiṃ dṛṣṭvā punar āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate /
V03vinv06_u:552: paśyasi tvam ānanda etāṃ nīlanīlāṃ vanarājim* /
V03vinv06_u:555: atra mathurāyāṃ naṭo bhaṭaś ca dvau bhrātarau mama varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya vihāraṃ pratiṣṭhāpayataḥ /
V03vinv06_u:556: tatas tasya naṭabhaṭika iti saṃjñā bhaviṣyati /
V03vinv06_u:559: adyānanda mathurāyāṃ gupto nāma gāndhikadārako bhaviṣyati /
V03vinv06_u:560: tasya putraḥ upagupto nāma bhaviṣyati alakṣaṇako buddhaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:561: sa mama varṣoṣitasya parinirvṛtasya śāsane pravrajya buddhakāryaṃ kariṣyati /
V03vinv06_u:569: ye ye tasyāvavāde arhatvaṃ sākṣātkariṣyanti te te caturaṅgulamātrāṃ kaṭikāṃ tasyāṃ guhāyāṃ prakṣepsyante /
V03vinv06_u:570: yadā sā guhā purṇā bhaviṣyati arhatkaṭikābhis tadā upaguptaḥ parinirvāsyati /
V03vinv06_u:571: parinirvṛtaṃ cainaṃ tābhir evārhatkaṭikābhiḥ sametya te dhmāpayiṣyanti /
V03vinv06_u:572: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ paripapracchuḥ /
V03vinv06_u:573: bhadanta bhagavatā āyuṣmān upagupto 'nāgata eva bahujanānukampī vyākṛta iti /
V03vinv06_u:575: na bhikṣava etarhi yathāsāv atīte 'py adhvani bahujanahitāya pratipannas tac chṛṇuta sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta bhāṣiṣye /
V03vinv06_u:576: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ asyaiva urumuṇḍasya parvatasya triṣu pārśveṣu pratyekabuddhā ṛṣayo markaṭāś ca prativasanti /
V03vinv06_u:578: pratyekabuddhaśatāni dvitīye pañca ṛṣiśatāni tṛtīye pañca markaṭaśatāni /
V03vinv06_u:579: ācaritaṃ markaṭayūthapater jātaṃ jātaṃ markaṭaśāvakaṃ praghātayati /
V03vinv06_u:580: tatas tā markaṭyaḥ śāvakaśokābhibhūtāḥ parasparaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ /
V03vinv06_u:582: ayam asmākaṃ yūthapatir jātaṃ jātaṃ śāvakaṃ praghātayati /
V03vinv06_u:584: yā asmākaṃ markaṭī āpannasatvā bhavati tayā yūthapater nārocayitavyam iti /
V03vinv06_u:585: yāvad apareṇa samayenānyatamā markaṭī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
V03vinv06_u:586: sā tābhiḥ pratigupte pradeśe gopāyitvā mūlaphalair upasthāpitā /
V03vinv06_u:588: so 'pi tābhiḥ pratigupte pradeśe sthāpitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhitaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:589: sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttas tadā tenāsau yūthapatiḥ svayūthāt pracyāvitaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:594: yadā viśvastasaṃvāsaḥ saṃvṛttas {MS smṛtaḥ} tadā teṣāṃ mūlapatrapuṣpaphaladantakāṣṭhair upasaṃhāraṃ karoti /
V03vinv06_u:596: ācaritaṃ teṣāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bhuktvā bhuktvā paryaṅke niṣīdanti /
V03vinv06_u:597: so 'pi markaṭas teṣām īryāpathaṃ dṛṣṭvā paryaṅkena niṣīdati /
V03vinv06_u:598: yāvad apareṇa samayena teṣāṃ pratyekabuddhānām etad abhavat* /
V03vinv06_u:600: prāptaṃ tad yan nu vayaṃ śāntaṃ nirvāṇadhātuṃ praviśema iti /
V03vinv06_u:601: tatas te jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtāḥ /
V03vinv06_u:604: sa markaṭas tān apaśyan dhṛtiṃ na labhate /
V03vinv06_u:605: yāvad asau markaṭo guhāṃ praviśya teṣāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ cīvarāṇi vikopayitum ārabdhaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:606: yā devatā tasyāṃ guhāyām adhyuṣitā tasyā etad abhavat* /
V03vinv06_u:608: pratyekabuddhacīvarāṇi vikopayiṣyatīti dvāraṃ mahatyā śilayā pidhāyāvasthitā /
V03vinv06_u:609: tato 'sau markaṭaḥ śocitvā klamitvā paridevitvā prakrāntaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:611: anabhiratitvād dhṛtiṃ na labhamāno 'vahitaśrotro manuṣyaśabdam ākāṃkṣati /
V03vinv06_u:613: sa mārgapranaṣṭa ivādhvagas tvaritatvaritaṃ teṣāṃ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:618: yadāsau markaṭas taiḥ sārdhaṃ viśvastasaṃvāsaḥ saṃvṛttas tadā teṣām ṛṣīṇāṃ mūlapatrapuṣpaphaladantakāṣṭhair upasaṃhāraṃ karoti /
V03vinv06_u:620: sa teṣām īryāpathaṃ vyākopya pratyekabuddheryāpathaṃ deśayati /
V03vinv06_u:621: tatra ye ūrdhvahastakās teṣāṃ hastān adhaḥ kṛtvā ricchaṭāśabdaṃ ca kṛtvā purastāt paryaṅkaṃ baddhvāvatiṣṭhate /
V03vinv06_u:622: ye pañcatapas tapyante teṣām agniṃ nirvāpya ricchaṭāśabdaṃ kṛtvā purastāt paryaṅkenāvatiṣṭhate /
V03vinv06_u:627: bhavantaḥ smṛtimanto hy ete śākhāmṛgā bhavanti /
V03vinv06_u:630: yūyam api yathāsthāpitaṃ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā niṣīdatha /
V03vinv06_u:633: tair anācāryakair anupādhyāyakair jñānena saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣadharmān utpādya pratyekabodhiḥ sākṣātkṛtas teṣāṃ markaṭasyāntike dharmānvayaḥ prasāda utpannaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:635: navaphalāni navartukāni janapadāt piṇḍapātaṃ pratilabhate tāni tasmai prathamato datvā tata ātmanaḥ paribhuñjate /
V03vinv06_u:636: tāvad apareṇa samayena sa markaṭaḥ kālagataḥ /
V03vinv06_u:637: tatas taiḥ pratyekabuddhair nānādigdeśādhiṣṭhāneṣu gandhakāṣṭhāni samādāpya sarvagandhakāṣṭhaiś citāṃ citvā dhmāpitaḥ
V03vinv06_u:639: yo 'sau pratyekabuddhaiḥ saṃpoṣito markaṭaḥ sa evāsāv upaguptaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:640: tadāpy asau bahujanahitāya pratipannaḥ etarhy apy asau mayā bahujanahitānukampī vyākṛta iti /
V03vinv06_u:641: atha bhagavāñ chūraseneṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran mathurām anuprāptaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:642: aśrauṣur māthurā brāhmaṇāḥ śramaṇo gautamo mathurām anuprāptaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:643: so 'tyarthaṃ cāturvarṇaviśuddhiṃ rocayati dīpayati prajñapayati prasthāpayati virujati vivṛṇoti uttānīkaroti deśayati /
V03vinv06_u:644: yady asau mathurāṃ pravekṣyati asmākaṃ lābhāntarāyo bhaviṣyati /
V03vinv06_u:646: yadi tasya kaścid asatkāraṃ kuryād evam asau mathurāṃ na praviśet* iti cāsya nīcapuruṣo 'satkāraṃ kuryāt* (MSV I 8)
V03vinv06_u:648: yady asya pradhānapuruṣaḥ kaścid asatkāraṃ kuryāc chobhanaṃ syāt* /
V03vinv06_u:650: tena khalu samayena mathurāyāṃ nīlabhūtir nāma brāhmaṇo vedavedāṅgapāragaḥ svavādoddyotakaḥ paravādanigrahasamarthaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:652: tato māthurā brāhmaṇāḥ saṅgamya samāgamya nīlabhūteḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntāḥ /
V03vinv06_u:653: upādhyāya śrūyate śramaṇo gautamo ihāgata iti /
V03vinv06_u:656: yadi tasya kaścid asatkāraṃ kuryād evam asau mathurāṃ na pravekṣyati /
V03vinv06_u:657: yadi cāsya nīcapuruṣo 'satkāraṃ kariṣyati na citrīkariṣyati /
V03vinv06_u:658: yady asya pradhānapuruṣaḥ kaścid asatkāraṃ kuryāc chobhanaṃ syāt* /
V03vinv06_u:665: tato nīlabhūtir brāhmaṇo vṛddhavṛddhair mathurānivāsibhir brāhmaṇaiḥ saṃpuraskṛto yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:666_0: adrākṣīn nīlabhūtir brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ dūrād eva dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ
V03vinv06_u:666_1: samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyomaprabhālaṅkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ (MSV I 9)
V03vinv06_u:667: jaṃgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam anyataraṃ vṛkṣamūlaṃ niśritya śāntena īryāpathena niṣaṇṇam* /
V03vinv06_u:675: caraṇaṃ susamāptam eva te susamāptavrata sādhitavrataḥ /
V03vinv06_u:676: balavāṃś ca samādhir avyayas tava nārāyaṇaśailarājavat* // 3
V03vinv06_u:677: puruṣarṣabha nāsti te vyathā na viṣādo na bhayaṃ na ca klamaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:678: na ca te vyasanaṃ kutaḥ kalir na ca bhūteṣu kadācid akṣamā // 4
V03vinv06_u:679: na ca dhāvasi nātilīyase na ca santapyasi nāpi hṛṣyase /
V03vinv06_u:680: satataṃ śubham eva te manaḥ satataṃ merur ivācalādhipaḥ // 5
V03vinv06_u:681: munipuṅgava sarvadhātubhir vipulaṃ jñānam apāvṛtaṃ tava /
V03vinv06_u:683: na ca te 'sti mune kathaṃkathā vimatir nāsti na saṃśayaḥ kvacit* /
V03vinv06_u:684: svayam eva na te parāparaṃ viditaṃ sarvam avedi vidyayā // 7
V03vinv06_u:687: samam eva hi te priyāpriyaṃ satataṃ prītikaras tatheryase // 8
V03vinv06_u:689: vividānumataṃ prabhāṣase triṣu lokeṣu ca te stṛtaṃ yaśaḥ / 9
V03vinv06_u:691: upagamya mune punaḥ punaḥ paripṛcchanti na cābhiṣūyase // 10
V03vinv06_u:693: pratiyānti vinītasaṃśayāś caraṇau vandya ca te mahāmune // 11
V03vinv06_u:694: sthitam āsitam āgataṃ gataṃ śayitaṃ maunam athābhyudīritam* /
V03vinv06_u:695: atha cīvarapātradhāraṇaṃ ruciraṃ gautama sarvam eva te // 12
V03vinv06_u:697: vacanaṃ punar uktavarjitaṃ samaye vyāharase narottama // 13
V03vinv06_u:698: balavān asi lokaviśrutaḥ puruṣajñaḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥ prabhuḥ /
V03vinv06_u:699: na ca manyasi nāvamanyase sakalaṃ lokam imaṃ sadaivatam* // 14
V03vinv06_u:700: na ca vismayase kadācana prakṛtistheṣu calācaleṣu ca /
V03vinv06_u:701: suhṛdeṣu ca durhṛdeṣu ca pratikūleṣv anulomavatsu ca // 15
V03vinv06_u:705: prasamīkṣya jagat samākulaṃ vividhair duḥkhaśatair upadrutam* /
V03vinv06_u:707: avatārya muner mahākṛpāṃ vividhāṃ cātmagatāṃ prabhāvatām* /
V03vinv06_u:708: svayam eva hi śākyapuṅgava vyathitān mocayituṃ tvam udyataḥ // 18
V03vinv06_u:709: bhavaduḥkham idaṃ sahetukaṃ bhavaduḥkhasya ca yaḥ parikṣayaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:712: na ca te sadṛśaḥ kuto 'dhikas triṣu lokeṣv api naiva vidyate // 20
V03vinv06_u:714: na santi te na ca te santi mune parisravāḥ /
V03vinv06_u:715: anurodhavirodhavigrahāḥ satataṃ suvrata naiva naiva te // 21
V03vinv06_u:716: apahāya mune priyāpriye sukhaduḥkhe viṣamaṃ samaṃ tathā /
V03vinv06_u:717: aratiṃ ca ratiṃ viparyayann upaśāntaś carasīha saṃyataḥ // 22
V03vinv06_u:718: vyasane na ca nāma nirmanā na ca nāmonnamase praśaṃsayā /
V03vinv06_u:719: ayaśaś ca yaśaś ca te samaṃ samam ākruṣṭam athāpi vanditam* // 23
V03vinv06_u:720: ativākyam atho titikṣase puruṣaṃ pāpajanair udīritam* /
V03vinv06_u:721: samarāgragato viṣāṇavān bhṛśamuktān iva kuñjaraḥ śarān* // 24
V03vinv06_u:723: suvacas tvam ṛṣe vacaḥkṣamaḥ sudurukteṣv api nābhiṣūyase /
V03vinv06_u:724: samam eva ca vartase mune paribhāṣāsu śubhāsu vākṣu ca // 25
V03vinv06_u:726: ṛṣibhiś ca sadā mahātmabhir na ca te vikriyate sthiraṃ manaḥ // 26
V03vinv06_u:727: pravaro 'ham ito na manyase 'tyavaro 'ham ito na manyase /
V03vinv06_u:728: sadṛśo 'ham ito na manyase trividhā mānavidhā na santi te // 27
V03vinv06_u:730: tṛṇakāṣṭhasamaṃ mahāmune carasīdaṃ hi sadevakaṃ jagat* // 28
V03vinv06_u:732: adhivāsayase nagendravan na ca te pravyathate sthiraṃ manaḥ // 29
V03vinv06_u:734: idam arthikato nideśase pratisaṃkhyāya mune nirāsravam* // 30
V03vinv06_u:735: na ca śocasi nātha nāsti me na ca te santi mune parigrahāḥ /
V03vinv06_u:737: na ca lābham avāpya hṛṣyase tadalābhāc ca layaṃ na gacchasi /
V03vinv06_u:738: avamānam atho titikṣase na ca saṃmānam ihābhinandasi // 32
V03vinv06_u:741: asayo niśitāḥ śarāś ca te na vikurvanti manaḥ kadācana // 33
V03vinv06_u:742: na kathāṃ kathayasy anarthikāṃ na ca yā durjanasevitā kathā /
V03vinv06_u:743: na ca lābhakathā na sāmiṣā na ca yā nānumatā mahātmabhiḥ // 34
V03vinv06_u:744: pravivekakathāḥ sukhāvahāḥ praśamaṃ yāḥ pravadanti kevalam* /
V03vinv06_u:745: kathayasy atidevatāḥ kathāḥ kathitā yā vinayanti kilviṣam* // 35
V03vinv06_u:746: madhurāṇi ca saṅgatāni ca svabhinītāni ca sāravanti ca /
V03vinv06_u:747: vacanāni mune prabhāṣase jagadarthāya viniścitāni ca // 36
V03vinv06_u:749: piśunāḥ paruṣāḥ śaṭhāś ca ye bhagavaṃs taiḥ saha saṅgataṃ na te // 37
V03vinv06_u:750: aśaṭhā ṛjavaś ca ye narāḥ śucayaḥ satyaratā jitendriyāḥ /
V03vinv06_u:751: satataṃ ca samīkṣyakāriṇo bhagavaṃs taiḥ saha saṅgataṃ tava // 38
V03vinv06_u:752: dharmajña nayajña pudgalajña tvāṃ vande ṣaḍabhijña sarvadaiva /
V03vinv06_u:753: kṣetrajña mune parāparajña tvāṃ vande śirasā nayānayajña // 39
V03vinv06_u:754: pṛthum api samīkṣate guṇaṃ tava parikathito hi mayā guṇaikadeśaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:756: na tava guṇamahārṇavasya pāraṃ jagati pumān adhigantum ārya śaktaḥ // 40
V03vinv06_u:758: ity evamādibhiḥ pañcabhiḥ stotraśatair bhagavān abhiṣṭutaḥ {MS abhituṣṭaḥ} /
V03vinv06_u:759: tathābhiprasannasya ca bhagavatā nīlabhūter dharmo deśitaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:760: yathā yathā tasminn evāsane niṣaṇṇena satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam* /
V03vinv06_u:761: atha nīlabhūtir brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ stutvā prakrāntaḥ /
